attributes.action: Revoke Jonathan Ross's OBE which was awarded for services to Broadcasting!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jonathan Ross should have his OBE revoked as a result of his recent lewd disorderly conduct as it was awarded for services to Broadcasting. The very least he could do is hand it back and say thanks, but I am no longer worthy of such an honour. Lets see if a petition can be set up on the Number 10 Downing Street Petition Website. It is an absolute disgrace what he an Brand have done. Talk about taking a step to far!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
